package.name: Contact_Vcard_Build
package.summary: Build (create) and fetch vCard 2.1 and 3.0 text blocks.
package.description: Allows you to programmatically create a vCard, version 2.1 or 3.0, and fetch the vCard text.

release.notes: * No longer generates notices when counting nonexistent components (thanks to Andrew Nagy for the bug report) * Added send() method to send headers and vCard text (suggested by Andrew Nagy) * Now runs clean under E_ALL
